headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for Dolphin Boiler - Smart Water Heating Control

name.title: Accessory Name
name.description: The accessory name that will appear in HomeKit

enableShowerSwitches.title: Enable Shower Switches
enableShowerSwitches.description: Enabling this will create switch for each amount of showers your boiler is capable of. It will allow you to turn on the boiler for X showers

hotWaterSensor.title: Hot Water Sensor
hotWaterSensor.description: This sensor will trigger when the water temperature reached the desired/target temperature (only when you turn ON the device from HomeKit)

enableHistoryStorage.title: Enable History Storage
enableHistoryStorage.description: Records all temperature history to be viewable in the Eve app

debug.title: Enable Debug Logs
debug.description: When checked, the plugin will produce extra logs for debugging purposes
